text: Stowe-by-Chartley is a village and civil parish in Staffordshire, England. At St John the Baptist's church in Stowe-by-Chartley, is a plaque by Sir Edwin Lutyens to the memory of Billy Congreve VC, DSO, MC (1891–1916) recipient of the Victoria Cross == Notable people == * Charles Lucas (1843 in Stowe-by- Chartley – 1919) an English first-class cricketer who played for Hampshire ESPN cricinfo Database retrieved 10 August 2018 * Rupert Evans (actor, born 1976) ==See also== * Listed buildings in Stowe-by-Chartley * Chartley Castle * Chartley railway station ==References== ==External links== * Stowe by Chartley Parish Council website Category:Villages in Staffordshire
title: Stowe-by-Chartley
